description: Lime Tree x 2 (T1) (Tilia cordata) Pollard to previous reduction points, to allow light into buildings. Reducing by 4m final height 10m spead 5m Oak Tree (T2) (Quercus robur) Remove water shoots and basal growth and remove lorry damaged branch over road to closest growth point. Final height and spread unchanged. Cedar Tree (T3) (Cedrus atlantica) Lifted over road. Trim away from building to provide a 1.5m clearance. Final height unchanged, spread 10m. Cherry Tree (T4) (Prunus avium) Fell to ground level. Dead tree needs to be removed for public safety. Ash Tree (T5) (Fraxinus excelsior) Remove ivy to ground level for future visual inspection and tree health. Final height and spread unchanged. Cedar Tree (T6) (Cedrus libani) Remove bottom limbs away from road to south east of tree, back to leader stem and cut bottom branches away from building on east side. To alleviate branch weight and prevent building damage. Final hight unchanged, Spread 10m. London Plane Tree (T7) (Platanus x acerifolia) Dead wood whole tree and inspect for public safety reasons. Final height and spread unchanged. Bay Tree (T8) (Laurus nobilis) 50% height reduction, trim sides to allow light and provide clearance from building. Reducing Tree by 3m Final height 6m, Spread 5m. Portuguese Laurel Tree (T9) (Prunus lusitanica) 30% reduction, trim into tight ball shape to allow light into the area. Reducing Tree up to one 1.5m. Final height 6m, Spread 5m. Portuguese Laurel Tree (T10) (Prunus lusitanica) 30% reduction, trim into tight ball shape to allow light into the area. Reducing Tree up to 1.5m. Final height 6m Spread 5m Maple Tree (T11) (Acer platanoides) Dead wood whole tree and inspect for public safety reasons. Final height and spread unchanged. Yew Tree (T12) (Taxus baccata) 30% reduction, trim into tight ball shape to allow light and provide clearance from building. Reducing Tree by up to 1.5m Final height 6m Spread 5m. Plum Tree (T15) (Prunus domestica) Fell to ground le
